channel.title: VitalizePK | Back Online
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E64Ws.png[/img] The server is [b]SPAWN AND MASTER.[/b]
[b]READ[/b] - Currently looking for staff, Please don't ask tho. Join now for a better chance of earning it.
[B]Promo:[/B] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s18ZI61eQds]VitalizePK | Back Online - YouTube[/url]
[B]Links:[/B] [url=http://www.vitalizepk.co.cc/forums]Forums[/url] [url=http://www.vitalizepk.co.cc/webclient.php]Webclient[/url] [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/36288851/Vitalize-PK%20Client.rar]Desktop Client[/url]
VitalizePK is an oldschool based server, Any later RS content such as dragon defender is a challenge to obtain. We aim to keep a balance as most people will be able to easily obtain basic PK items, barrows, non-spawnables (torso, defender etc.) with ease and get pking. But the option is there for anyone who puts the effort in to gain an advantage with more powerful items such as PvP armour etc.
[B]Developer:[/B] • Dan. (Main Developer)
[B]Server Content:[/B] • Flawless switching. • Great combat. • Hyperion Core. • Instant login and PK. • Various PK teleports.
[B]Client Content:[/B] • 377 cache loading some 600+ items. • Toggle options e.g x10 hits. • Low data usage. • Small cache. • Clean and tidy.
[B]Media:[/B]
